seg-source.mrk: derby.database.fullAccessUsers

target.mrk: derby.database.fullAccessUsers

seg-source.mrk: derby.database.fullAccessUsers

target.mrk: derby.database.fullAccessUsers

seg-source.mrk: User authorization

target.mrk: User authorization

seg-source.mrk: configuring

target.mrk: configuring

seg-source.mrk: Function

target.mrk: Function

trans-unit.source: One of the user authorization properties. Specifies a list of users to which full (read-write) access to a database is granted. The list consists of user names separated by commas. Do not put spaces after commas.

seg-source.mrk: One of the user authorization properties.
Specifies a list of users to which full (read-write) access to a database is granted.
The list consists of user names separated by commas.
Do not put spaces after commas.

target.mrk: One of the user authorization properties.
Specifies a list of users to which full (read-write) access to a database is granted.
The list consists of user names separated by commas.
Do not put spaces after commas.

trans-unit.source: When set as a system property, specifies a list of users for which full access to all the databases in the system is granted.

seg-source.mrk: When set as a system property, specifies a list of users for which full access to all the databases in the system is granted.

target.mrk: When set as a system property, specifies a list of users for which full access to all the databases in the system is granted.

seg-source.mrk: See also .

target.mrk: See also .

trans-unit.source: A malformed list of user names raises an exception. Do not specify a user both with this property and in derby.database.readOnlyAccessUsers.

seg-source.mrk: A malformed list of user names raises an exception.
Do not specify a user both with this property and in derby.database.readOnlyAccessUsers.

target.mrk: A malformed list of user names raises an exception.
Do not specify a user both with this property and in derby.database.readOnlyAccessUsers.

trans-unit.source: User names, called authorization identifiers, follow the rules of SQL92Identifiers and can be delimited. Specifying a user name that does not follow these rules raises an exception.

seg-source.mrk: User names, called authorization identifiers, follow the rules of SQL92Identifiers and can be delimited.
Specifying a user name that does not follow these rules raises an exception.

target.mrk: User names, called authorization identifiers, follow the rules of SQL92Identifiers and can be delimited.
Specifying a user name that does not follow these rules raises an exception.

trans-unit.source: For more information about user authorization, see "User authorizations" in the <cite><ph conref="../conrefs.dita#pub/citdevelop"></ph></cite>.

seg-source.mrk: For more information about user authorization, see "User authorizations" in the <cite><ph conref="../conrefs.dita#pub/citdevelop"></ph></cite>.

target.mrk: For more information about user authorization, see "User authorizations" in the <cite><ph conref="../conrefs.dita#pub/citdevelop"></ph></cite>.

seg-source.mrk: Syntax

target.mrk: Syntax

seg-source.mrk: -- database-level property CALL SYSCS_UTIL.SYSCS_SET_DATABASE_PROPERTY( 'derby.database.fullAccessUsers', 'commaSeparatedlistOfUsers')

target.mrk: -- database-level property CALL SYSCS_UTIL.SYSCS_SET_DATABASE_PROPERTY( 'derby.database.fullAccessUsers', 'commaSeparatedlistOfUsers')

seg-source.mrk: Example

target.mrk: Example

seg-source.mrk: -- database-level property CALL SYSCS_UTIL.SYSCS_SET_DATABASE_PROPERTY( 'derby.database.fullAccessUsers', 'dba,fred,peter') --system-level property derby.database.fullAccessUsers=dba,fred,peter

target.mrk: -- database-level property CALL SYSCS_UTIL.SYSCS_SET_DATABASE_PROPERTY( 'derby.database.fullAccessUsers', 'dba,fred,peter') --system-level property derby.database.fullAccessUsers=dba,fred,peter

seg-source.mrk: Dynamic or static

target.mrk: Dynamic or static

trans-unit.source: Dynamic. Current connections are not affected, but all future connections are affected. For information about dynamic changes to properties, see <xref href="crefproperdynstat.dita#crefproperdynstat"/>.

seg-source.mrk: Dynamic.
Current connections are not affected, but all future connections are affected.
For information about dynamic changes to properties, see <xref href="crefproperdynstat.dita#crefproperdynstat"/>.

target.mrk: Dynamic.
Current connections are not affected, but all future connections are affected.
For information about dynamic changes to properties, see <xref href="crefproperdynstat.dita#crefproperdynstat"/>.
